column4: ﻿Hi everyone. I'm using Ubuntu8.04, and FF3, I have a problem with FF3, it disappear sometimes while I'm surfing, for example when I open the isohunt.com it just disappear and i can't even restore my session when I start FF3 again, please does anybody has any solution, thanks in advice

﻿Hi everyone. I'm using Ubuntu8.04, and FF3, I have a problem with FF3, it disappear sometimes while I'm surfing, for example when I open the isohunt.com it just disappear and i can't even restore my session when I start FF3 again, please does anybody has any solution, thanks in advice
